data.text: Yahweh says, “You Israeli people, come back to me!
and if you declare, ‘Just as surely as Yahweh lives, what he says is true,’
This is what Yahweh says to the people of Jerusalem and the other cities in Judah:
Purify your inner beings and your minds for me.
“Declare this [DOU] to all the people in Jerusalem and the rest of Judea;
Shout to the people of Jerusalem,
An army that has destroyed many nations will attack you
So, put on sackcloth/rough clothes
Yahweh said that at the time he punishes you, the King of Judah and all his officials will be very afraid.
Then I replied, “Yahweh my God, you completely deceived the people by telling them that there would be peace in Jerusalem, but now our enemies [PRS] are ready to slaughter us with their swords!”
When that happens, Yahweh will say to the people of Jerusalem,
They will be like [MET] a strong blast that I will send.
Our enemies are about to rush down on us; their chariots are like [SIM] whirlwinds.
You people of Jerusalem [APO], purify your hearts/inner beings,
From Dan city in the far north to the hills of Ephraim a few miles/kilometers north of Jerusalem messengers are proclaiming that disasters are coming.
Tell this to the people in other nations
They will set up tents around Jerusalem like people set up temporary shelters [SIM] around a field at harvest time.
You will be punished very severely;
I am extremely anguished/sad;
Disasters will occur one after another
How long will this battle continue?
Yahweh says, “My people are very foolish!
God gave me a vision in which I saw
I looked at the mountains and hills,
I looked and saw that there were no more people,
I looked and saw that the fields that previously were fertile had become a desert.
This is what Yahweh is saying:
I will do to my people what I said that I would do,
When the people hear the sound of the enemy army marching,
So you who will surely be destroyed,
It is as though I already hear the people in Jerusalem crying very loudly,
